CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT( Stopover_City__c ) = "AUH", "Abu Dhabi", IF( TEXT(Stopover_City__c) = "DXB", "Dubai", IF( TEXT(Stopover_City__c) = "HKG", "Hong Kong", IF( TEXT(Stopover_City__c) = "SIN", "Singapore", IF( TEXT(Stopover_City__c) = "BKK", "Bangkok","")))))
CustomField.label: Stopover City Name
